nodes.bodyText: Could you please elaborate on what does explainCalc mean?
Maybe put a simple (non-trivial) example in the javadoc. Expressions, common sub-expressions, filter, some output fields based on constants, some input fields pruned from the output.

I'm afraid it is obscure what is the expected output and why is that expected. Do you think you can convert the expected value to a single string with a corresponding message that clarifies why the value is expected?
For instance, when testing planning rules we use full explain plan for comparison rather than adding lots assertions.

This case just follow the style of other cases in this class.
To make it simple to read, I'll add a check for the full string result in the end of case.
calcFilterAndProjects  -> calcProjectsAndFilter ? Because projects are the key part.
